backend/main.mo: Placeholder backend actor with no functional logic; backend not involved in joystick changes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three snake‑game fixes referencing two frontend snake logic files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for numerous frontend match‑3 game files used for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions and global color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the PWA manifest, icons, and main React entry point.
frontend/PLAY_STORE_TWA_GUIDE.md: Guide explaining how to package and publish the Snake PWA to Google Play using TWA and Bubblewrap.
frontend/public/.well-known/assetlinks.j: Android asset links config enabling TWA domain association for the Android app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and display behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precache, runtime cache, and network‑first/offline fallback logic.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component registering the service worker and rendering the Snake game UI.
frontend/src/game/animations.ts: Defines animation timing constants and a helper wait function.
frontend/src/game/assets.ts: Maps asset file paths and provides a helper to compute candy sprite positions.
frontend/src/game/audio/audioManager.ts: Implements a simple audio manager with sound loading, playback, and mute control, initialized with silent placeholder sounds.
frontend/src/game/audio/sfx.ts: Exports helper functions to play specific sound effects through the audio manager.
frontend/src/game/boardGeneration.ts: Generates initial and refilled boards, ensuring no immediate matches and creating candies with unique IDs.
frontend/src/game/boardReshuffle.ts: Reshuffles board until it produces legal moves, retrying up to a limit.
frontend/src/game/CandyTile.tsx: Renders an individual candy tile with sprite selection, special candy visuals, and input handlers.
frontend/src/game/GameBoard.tsx: Renders the candy grid, manages touch swipe detection, and triggers cell selection and swaps.
frontend/src/game/GameScreen.tsx: Main game UI component handling HUD, board rendering, overlays, audio mute toggle, and basic game actions.
frontend/src/game/gravity.ts: Applies gravity to drop candies downward and returns the updated board with fall metadata.
frontend/src/game/interaction.ts: Utility functions for adjacency checks, position validation, and directional movement.
frontend/src/game/legalMoves.ts: Determines whether any swap on the board would produce a match.
frontend/src/game/matchDetection.ts: Detects horizontal and vertical matches and checks whether a swap would create a match.
frontend/src/game/Overlays.tsx: Provides Game Over and Level Complete overlay components with icons and action buttons.
frontend/src/game/progression.ts: Generates level configuration and checks if target score has been reached.
frontend/src/game/resolutionPipeline.ts: Resolves matches, creates specials, clears candies, triggers special activations, and computes score gained.
frontend/src/game/scoring.ts: Provides score calculation, level target scoring, and initial move counts.
frontend/src/game/specialActivations.ts: Computes areas affected by special candies and detects certain special candy combos.
frontend/src/game/specialCandyRules.ts: Defines logic for determining special candies from matches and applies special candy creation to the board.
frontend/src/game/touchControls.ts: Detects swipe gestures based on movement thresholds and returns a directional result.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Declares core Match-3 game types, constants, and interfaces for candies, matches, animations, and game state.
frontend/src/game/useMatch3Game.ts: Implements the main Match-3 game state hook, handling board setup, moves, cascades, scoring, and level progression.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullscreen.ts: Provides a hook to enter, exit, and toggle fullscreen mode with cross-browser support.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider, handling login, stored identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook indicating no backend queries are used in the game.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, theme variables, and layout styling for the game's UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/snake/Joystick.tsx: Implements a draggable on-screen joystick that emits filtered angle updates using SteeringFilter and handles pointer events.
frontend/src/snake/joystickSteeringFilte: Defines a steering filter applying deadzone, smoothing, and hysteresis to joystick input to produce stable angle output.
frontend/src/snake/logic.ts: Contains world constants and game logic utilities for movement, angle math, wrapping, and initializing snakes and pickups.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeCanvas.tsx: Renders the snake game world onto a canvas, drawing background tiles, grid, pickups, and snakes with camera zoom and translation.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeOverlays.tsx: Provides UI overlays for idle, paused, and game-over states with icons, stats, and action buttons.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeScreen.tsx: Composes the full snake game UI including header, HUD, canvas, joystick, overlays, and fullscreen controls.
frontend/src/snake/types.ts: Declares TypeScript types for vectors, snakes, pickups, game state, and status values.
frontend/src/snake/useSnakeGame.ts: React hook implementing the Snake game loop, updating movement, AI, collisions, pickups, and applying turn‑rate and delta‑time limits.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing bug‑fix goals, feature requests, and known issues for the Snake Arena game.
